Package io.papermc.paper.event.player

package io.papermc.paper.event.player
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractChatEvent
    An abstract implementation of a chat event, handling shared logic.
    AsyncChatCommandDecorateEvent
     
    AsyncChatDecorateEvent
    This event is fired when the server decorates a component for chat purposes.
    AsyncChatEvent
    An event fired when a Player sends a chat message to the server.
    ChatEvent
    Deprecated.
    Listening to this event forces chat to wait for the main thread, delaying chat messages.
    PlayerArmSwingEvent
     
    PlayerBedFailEnterEvent
     
    PlayerBedFailEnterEvent.FailReason
     
    PlayerChangeBeaconEffectEvent
    Called when a player sets the effect for a beacon
    PlayerDeepSleepEvent
    Called when a player has slept long enough to count as passing the night/storm.
    PlayerFlowerPotManipulateEvent
    Called when a player places an item in or takes an item out of a flowerpot.
    PlayerInventorySlotChangeEvent
    Called when a slot contents change in a player's inventory.
    PlayerItemCooldownEvent
    Fired when a player receives an item cooldown.
    PlayerItemFrameChangeEvent
    Called when an ItemFrame is having an item rotated, added, or removed from it.
    PlayerItemFrameChangeEvent.ItemFrameChangeAction
     
    PlayerLecternPageChangeEvent
     
    PlayerLecternPageChangeEvent.PageChangeDirection
     
    PlayerLoomPatternSelectEvent
    Called when a player selects a banner patten in a loom inventory.
    PlayerNameEntityEvent
    Called when the player is attempting to rename a mob
    PlayerPurchaseEvent
    Called when a player trades with a standalone merchant GUI.
    PlayerSignCommandPreprocessEvent
    Called when a Player clicks a sign that causes a command to run.
    PlayerStonecutterRecipeSelectEvent
     
    PlayerStopUsingItemEvent
    Called when the server detects a player stopping using an item.
    PlayerTrackEntityEvent
    Is called when a Player tracks an Entity.
    PlayerTradeEvent
    Called when a player trades with a villager or wandering trader
    PlayerUntrackEntityEvent
    Is called when a Player untracks an Entity.
    PrePlayerAttackEntityEvent
    Called when the player tries to attack an entity.
